languages.text: "Трудности закаляют чувства. Чтобы достичь понимания, иногда нужно хорошенько повздорить".
"Hard times can forge tender feelings into something stronger. Sometimes it takes a good fight to reach true understanding."
languages.original_text: "Трудности закаляют чувства. Чтобы достичь понимания, иногда нужно хорошенько повздорить".

traits.locale_text: "Hard times can forge tender feelings into something stronger. Sometimes it takes a good fight to reach true understanding."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hard times can forge tender feelings into something stronger. Sometimes it takes a good fight to reach true understanding."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hard times can forge tender feelings into something stronger. Sometimes it takes a good fight to reach true understanding."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hard times can forge tender feelings into something stronger. Sometimes it takes a good fight to reach true understanding."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “磨难显真情。有时只有通过争执，才能相互理解。”
languages.original_text: "Hard times can forge tender feelings into something stronger. Sometimes it takes a good fight to reach true understanding."

traits.locale_text: “磨难显真情。有时只有通过争执，才能相互理解。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Quand les temps sont durs, les sentiments de tendresse peuvent se transformer en quelque chose de plus fort. Parfois, il suffit d'une bonne dispute pour parvenir à réellement se comprendre. »
languages.original_text: "Hard times can forge tender feelings into something stronger. Sometimes it takes a good fight to reach true understanding."

traits.locale_text: « Quand les temps sont durs, les sentiments de tendresse peuvent se transformer en quelque chose de plus fort. Parfois, il suffit d'une bonne dispute pour parvenir à réellement se comprendre. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Los momentos difíciles pueden forjar los sentimientos tiernos en algo más fuerte. A veces es necesaria una buena pelea para alcanzar el entendimiento completo».
languages.original_text: "Hard times can forge tender feelings into something stronger. Sometimes it takes a good fight to reach true understanding."

traits.locale_text: «Los momentos difíciles pueden forjar los sentimientos tiernos en algo más fuerte. A veces es necesaria una buena pelea para alcanzar el entendimiento completo».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「困難な時間は、優しい感情をより強いものへと鍛え上げる。真の理解に達するには、時には良い戦いが必要です」
languages.original_text: "Hard times can forge tender feelings into something stronger. Sometimes it takes a good fight to reach true understanding."

traits.locale_text: 「困難な時間は、優しい感情をより強いものへと鍛え上げる。真の理解に達するには、時には良い戦いが必要です」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Schwere Zeiten können aus zarten Gefühlen füreinander etwas Stärkeres schmieden. Manchmal ist ein ordentlicher Kampf nötig, um wahres Verständnis zu erreichen."
languages.original_text: "Hard times can forge tender feelings into something stronger. Sometimes it takes a good fight to reach true understanding."

traits.locale_text: "Schwere Zeiten können aus zarten Gefühlen füreinander etwas Stärkeres schmieden. Manchmal ist ein ordentlicher Kampf nötig, um wahres Verständnis zu erreichen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Hard times can forge tender feelings into something stronger. Sometimes it takes a good fight to reach true understanding."

languages.text: "Zor zamanlar, hassas duyguları daha güçlü kılabilir. Öyle ki mutabık kalmak için mücadele verilmesi gerekir."
languages.original_text: "Hard times can forge tender feelings into something stronger. Sometimes it takes a good fight to reach true understanding."

traits.locale_text: "Zor zamanlar, hassas duyguları daha güçlü kılabilir. Öyle ki, mutabık kalmak için mücadele verilmesi gerekir."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
